concepts.title: Fluid Chrome / Жидкий Хром
concepts.description: Y2K aesthetic meeting modern 3D design. A liquid metal star or abstract shape that feels tangible, expensive, and futuristic.
concepts.generation_prompt: 3D render of a liquid chrome abstract star logo. Y2K acid graphics aesthetic. Melting metal texture, high gloss, reflection of purple and neon blue studio lighting. Floating in a dark void. Ultra-realistic, 8k, octane render, futuristic jewelry design style.

concepts.title: Brutalist Glyph / Брутализм
concepts.description: Raw, bold, and anti-design. Thick lines, sharp angles, maybe a bit of distress or 'glitch'. Stands out by being aggressive and confident.
concepts.generation_prompt: Neo-brutalist logo symbol. A heavy, thick abstract glyph resembling the letter 'A' mixed with a star. Swiss international style meets acid techno. Stark black ink on white paper. Grunge texture, sharp edges, ink trap details. Bold, aggressive, streetwear brand aesthetic.

concepts.title: Etheyreal Artifact / Эфирный Артефакт
concepts.description: Something that looks like a rune from an advanced alien civilization or a magical sigil. Thin intricate lines, glowing, mysterious.
concepts.generation_prompt: Glowing magical sci-fi sigil logo. Intricate sacred geometry formed by thin glowing laser lines. Cyber-mysticism aesthetic. Cyan and violet neon light lines hovering in dark fog. Minimalist but complex structure. Final Fantasy logo style mixed with Tron.
